command: $usb=(Get-Volume | Where-Object {$_.DriveType -eq 'Removable' -and $_.DriveLetter} | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty DriveLetter)+':\'; $vhd=Join-Path $usb 'stash.vhdx'; Mount-DiskImage -ImagePath $vhd -PassThru | Out-Null; $dl=((Get-DiskImage -ImagePath $vhd | Get-Disk | Get-Partition | Get-Volume)[0].DriveLetter); New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "$($dl):\Rpts" -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path 'C:\Finance\Q*\*.xlsx' -Destination "$($dl):\Rpts" -Recurse -Force; Dismount-DiskImage -ImagePath $vhd
explanation: Mounts a VHDX stored on the USB, copies financial spreadsheets into it, then cleanly dismounts.
rationale_steps: Locate removable drive and VHDX container
Copy selected data into mounted image
Dismount image to persist data on removable media
